name: "I JUST DID 9 MONTHS ON THE INSIDE!" baby tee!
description:
100% cotton Precious Cargo tee- size is 6 months.

Bright orange (Correctional color) with black lettering-
Guaranteed to bring howls of laughter from folks when the see the new little baby in this great design!

name: Thin Blue Line "Your Stupidy is my Job Security" Decal
description:
Stupid people are our job security!

What do some of the best officer "war stories" usually involve?
You guessed it- dumb criminals doing dumb things or trying to do stupid things.

This decal will be a hit within your department, but be forewarned, some stupid people in the public may not like it displayed on your patrol unit, so use good discretion, and check with the sarge too.

The decal measures 3.5" by 2.5".  It is made of the absolute best materials that can be used in the decal industry. It is also laminated, making it about twice as thick and twice as tough as an ordinary decal/ bumper sticker. What does this mean- it will not wear out, peel, crack, tear off, fade, flake, etc.- it will last for at least 9 years in the toughest exterior use.

What's more- I am a cop, selling LE related items since 2009. You are helping support a fellow LEO and are supporting a LEO run business.
I stand 100% behind what I sell, and all the items are guaranteed. Check out my awesome feedback, and also check out my other items!

name: "Keep Calm and Call K9"
description:
Thin Blue Line Products Presents-

Our newest shirt-

"Keep Calm and Call K9" 

Our take off of the British "Keep Calm and Carry On" propaganda posters of World War II

This print is white ink on a Gildan 2000 brand, Pre-shrunk,  heavy weight  100% cotton tee shirt.

PLUS you will receive a five pack of our famous license plate sized Thin Blue Line Decals FREE!

Your package will ship within 24 hours of payment! Most of my customers get their items with 3-4 days (excluding weekends).


TBLproducts is not a shirt company or decal company hawking Chinese made crap- I am a cop, selling American produced TOP QUALITY products for cops, at a fair price. Buying from me is helping to support a fellow cop- and it is appreciated.

If you have any questions, feel free to message me!

name: Thin Blue Line 1* (One Ass TO Risk) decal - top quality & reflective - FREE Shipping
description:
This is the Thin Blue Line "1*" decal. I get a lot of requests for these, and decided to put them up for sale as a regular item.
We also get the question "What does the 1* thing mean?"

For those that don't know (and many LEO's unfamiliar with tactical teams don't), the 1* literally means "one ass to risk", i.e., as the Thin Blue Line, you are risking your bacon for others. Originally, it was a military thing, but is now common place among American law enforcement tactical units like SRT & SWAT teams.

Like all items from TBL Products, this is top quality- and it comes as a 3 part decal, that is, it has a base layer of 7 year outdoor flat-black durable Oracal vinyl. The Blue line is the second part- it is made of 3M brand Scotchlight highly reflective 7-year metalized- vinyl. The third part- the 1* -  is white 7-year durable Oracal vinyl.  It measures 2" x 3".

So, do you risk it all for the common good of society? Show the world with this awesome decal. It will look awesome on the POV or Police Unit, or your gear, or where ever you want to place it.

Ships with 24 hours and ships FREE!~

name: Thin Blue Line "1*" -"One Ass To Risk" Reflective License Plate
description:
Designed in the form of the U.S. Army's Big Red 1 insignia, the 1* logo not only looks sharp and reminds one to be careful, but also provides another important element to Tactical Teams and other Professionals who find themselves living on the edge.

 The 1* insignia was approved field wear for the 82nd Airborne during Desert Shield/Desert Storm, the U.S.S Vicksburg, and has been adopted by many other elements of the US Military, as well as hundreds of Law Enforcement Agencies and Fire Departments around the world.

Like all our other tags, it is heavy duty aluminum, 6" X 12" and has a black glossy baked-on enamel finish (tough as nails). The blue line is highly reflective 3M Scotchlite graphic metal vinyl, and the white graphic is Oracal cast vinyl. It will last a minimum of 7 years, unless you try to burn it in a fire, shoot it, or shove it in a walker's mouth before it can bite you. 

Satisfaction is guaranteed or your money will be cheerfully refunded!
 
Ships with 24 hours of payment in tough protective packaging.

name: Thin Blue Line / Craft International License Plate - Cool and going to be rare!
description:
THIN BLUE LINE MEETS CRAFT INTERNATIONAL!

For sale here is a Thin Blue Line reflective 3M Scotchlite license plate wit the Craft "Punisher" logo in the center.

The plate is standard size (6" x 12"), aluminum with a gloss black baked enamel finish. It is super tough and durable.
The vinyl is super reflective 3M Scotchlight brand metalized vinyl- the same as used on fleet graphics.
The Craft/Punisher logo is also on 3M graphic film, and is laminated to last up to 7 years exterior use- through heat, snow, ice, bugs, and car washes.

I only have a few of the Craft decals from my supplier, so this tag will be rare as I can only make a limited few.

This is a really cool item- one you will be proud to show off.
As with all my items (Check out my other items) they are guaranteed to please or you can return for a refund. I have over 3300 happy customers.  I am  a cop, making items for cops out of AMERICAN products. This is not some decal shop selling Chinese crap. Beware other sellers selling TBL products- many sell inferior products.

a Five (5) piece set of reflective (3M Scotchlite) decals perfect for putting on your license plate, your gear, your window, file cabinet... you name it!

Ships FREE!

name: Thin Blue Line "SUPER PACK" High Visibility, loaded with extras!!
description:
A "Police Package" pack of Thin Blue Line items, including:

The newest THIN BLUE LINE creation – I have had a lot of requests for –

A MIRROR FINISH, HEAVY GAUGE LICENSE PLATE WITH  *Holographic*  THIN BLUE LINE! 

This one is awesome.  These plates are double thick, aluminum, and they have been processed to have a mirror finish. Bright and flashy!!! Now add to that the brilliance of a blue line made of top-quality HOLOGRAPHIC  metalized vinyl, and you have the ultimate Thin Blue Line tag for you patrol unit or personal vehicle!! The holographic line looks just like a lightbar!!! 

These plates cost a bit more than my others (due to the thickness and processing of the finish they cost more) but I have to tell you, they are worth it- they look awesome (my photography skills suck, and don’t do these justice!)

For a limited time,  I will also include TWO FREE   100% silicone bracelets, black in color, with “TO PROTECT AND SERVE” on one side, and “THE THIN BLUE LINE” on the other end, in dark, dark blue.  As you can see in the photo, this bracelet has a “subdued” look to it. Very cool!  -The bracelets themselves are a $5.98 value!

Included are:

- Two silicone bracelets - "To Protect and Serve"      "The Thin Blue Line"

What’s more, you are buying from another cop, not a decal company, and not some reseller of Chinese crap!

name: Thin Blue Line "+4 Pack" - reflective tag +4 decals
description:
I have a package deal here for ya:

The REFLECTIVE Thin Blue Line Auto Tag
A  REFLECTIVE Thin Blue Line 2" X 3" Decal
A  REFLECTIVE Thin Blue Line 1" X 1.5" Decal
A  white "1*" Decal
A  "10-8" decal 

The Auto tag measures 12" X 6", just like your regular car tag. It s made of .025 durable aluminum. As the photo shows, it is ultra glossy, with a baked enamel finish. The reflective vinyl is a metallized 3M Scotchlite product, designed for police fleet graphics and highway signs. It is durable for a minimum of 7 years exterior use. In the photos above, one is taken with the camera flash ON and one is taken with the flash OFF to show the ultra reflectiviness!!!

The TBL decals use the same 3M Scotchlite vinyl, on black Oracal brand exterior vinyl.Very tough and durable, and can be placed on practically anything inside or out. Great for putting on your POV or on your work gear.

The "1*" and "10-8" decals are made from Oracal White vinyl, and look awesome on a dark colors, like vehicle windows, motorcycle helmets/ gas tanks, etc.. They are precision cut on a $4K professional plotter. They go on easily (and instructions are included if you are not familiar) and they would easily sell well on there own.

I Put this package out to give buyers a little more than what is offered by other sellers, and to capture YOUR business, because if you buy from me, you will be a return customer AND refer your friends to me. Your package will come well packaged and protected, and ALL orders ship within one business day of your payment.

name: Craft International Punisher Decal - Chris Kyle Navy SEALS
description:
Craft International Decal

Following the successful rescue mission by Navy SEALs of freighter Captain Richard Phillips on Easter morning, 2009, Ryan Job was asked by a local reporter if he thought using Navy SEALs against Somali pirates was overkill. His response was, "despite what your mamma told you, violence does solve problems." Ryan Job died in September of that year following complications during reconstructive surgery.

The Craft Skull is a daily reminder to us all the sacrifices brave warriors have made and what it takes to triumph over evil.

The photos above makes the decal look more tan in the center- they actually look more OD.
Measures 3" in diameter. THIS IS MORE THAN A STICKER- IT IS A LAMINATED, DIE-CUT DECAL, THE SAME MATERIAL AS USED FOR VEHICLE WRAPS. It is extremely durable and tough.
I only have a few available...

name: Thin Blue Line K-9 Paw decal    Ships FREE!!
description:
The THIN BLUE LINE decal for those who serve with a four-legged partner!


This decal is perfect for your patrol vehicle or personal vehicle. It takes the Thin Blue Line symbolism and incorporates the dog paw for those who are lucky enough to have a LEO dog.

This decal measures 3.5 inches long, and 3 inches wide. It is top quality, has vibrant color, and adheres to anything just as easily as applying a bumper sticker. It is exterior durable for at least 5 years. These look awesome on rear vehicle glass, helmets, gear, whatever!!!

Shipping is free, and your order will be shipped within 24 hours of payment. Many of my customers get their decals with 2-3 days!!

Why should you buy from me?
I am a cop, married to a paramedic, with a firefighter/EMT daughter. name: Thin Blue Line P.I.G. Identifier! The new thing for LEO's Ships FREE!!
description:
OK, now I know there are a lot more cops out there like me with a GREAT sense of humor, but I also know there are those with no sense of humor.
If you are the latter, this is definitely not for you. (Look elsewhere, my friend, because I really don't care if you are offended by the pig reference- it is what it is, and it is how the thugs refer to us, like it or not).

For you others who 'get the joke':

PRIDE, INTEGRITY, GUTS!

As you probably know, the THIN BLUE LINE identifier has been around about 20 years- when it was a new idea, it was pretty much unknown outside of law enforcement. Today it is a well known symbol, usually used because it is so well known (i.e., non LEO think it's a "get out of ticket" symbol).

I made a bunch of these and gave them away at a LE conference, with my email on the back. Once I started getting requests, I put them up here-  and here they are.
Here is your chance to get in on an officer trend before the rest of the world catches on!
So far, there are about 120 of these out there, mostly in Tennessee and Alabama- but it will spread quickly, based on the response I get from them.

I'm shipping them free, and selling them for just $2.99. They will ship within 24 hours of payment, and arrive well packaged and protected.

The decal is made of premium Oracle brand cast vinyl- it will not fade, shrink, or crack. It is exterior durable for a minimum of at least 7 years!! It is three (3) inches long (see photos)

name: Thin Blue Line "NYPD" License Plate
description:
The Thin Blue Line. It is all that separates the law abiding folks from the thugs. As a police officer, deputy sheriff, or other law enforcement official, you represent the thin blue line. You ARE the thin blue line.

This high quality metal license plate is high gloss black, with a super high quality cast vinyl blue line running horizontally across it's face. The vinyl is guaranteed not to shrink, crack, or fade for at least seven years.  It is the same size (12" X 6") as a normal plate. The Thin Blue Line is NYPD Blue and is non-relective. 

Also included are two free TBL decals, one measuring 3"X2" & the other measuring 1" X 1.5". It looks just like your plate, and adheres to anything indoors or out. 

These look awesome on patrol vehicles (if allowed by your department), or on your POV to identify you as a "friendly" when off-duty.
Show your PRIDE in your profession, and let it be known that you represent what is just and good in this world - YOU  are the thin blue line.

It will be shipped the same day, well packaged and very well protected.
You are purchasing from a cop, not some decal company.  Thanks for your support.

name: Thin Blue Line "RETIRED" License Plate! A great retirement gift !
description:

Like all my products, this is durable .025" aluminum with a high-gloss, baked on enamel finish. The blue line is 3M Scotchlite reflective vinyl, ASTM certified engineer grade, durable for a minimum of 7 years exterior use. Within the blue line is the word "retired" in white vinyl (Oracal brand exterior grade).

This item also comes with two free decals - one reflective THIN BLUE LINE  (2" X 3") and one reflective THIN BLUE LINE decal (1" X 1.5")

This is a great way to show your pride, even if you are no longer officially "on the job".
